text: The 2015 UCI Juniors Track World Championships was the annual Junior World Championship for track cycling held at the Saryarka Velodrome in Astana, Kazakhstan from 19 to 23 August 2015.2015 UCI TRACK CYCLING JUNIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS allsportdb.com Medals were won across 19 disciplines.uci.ch ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Events |- |Sprint |Park Je One ||
